author: hlship
msg: Introduce library mappings used when resolving page names and component types to fully qualified class names.
Implement property paths for the prop: binding.
Simplify update and invalidation listener interfaces.
Support a type() attribute in the Component annotation.
Change RequestPageCache to take a logical page name, rather than a fully qualified class name.
Add support for catching and reporting uncaught request exceptions.
Introduce the initial versions of the If and Loop core components.

author: ndbeyer
msg: Clean up compiler warnings in auth tests; pull classes into their own files.
